problems.name: Programming Quiz
problems.description: What is the most common first string that you print when you start learning a programming language.

problems.name: Love Laces
problems.description: What woman is widely considered to be the first computer scientist?
problems.hint: Her dad was a pretty good poet

problems.name: Programming Beginner
